Class RestMedicalrecord

java.lang.Object
fr.SafetyNet.SafetyNetAlerts.controller.RestMedicalrecord
@RestController public class RestMedicalrecord extends Object
Rest controller for managing Medicalrecord entities.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description

    Constructs a new RestMedicalrecord with the specified MedicalrecordService.

  • Constructor Details

    • RestMedicalrecord

      public RestMedicalrecord(MedicalrecordService medicalrecordService)
      Constructs a new RestMedicalrecord with the specified MedicalrecordService.
      Parameters:
      medicalrecordService - the service to manage medical records

  • Method Details

    • readAll

      @GetMapping("/medicalrecord") public List<Medicalrecord> readAll()
      Retrieves all medical records.
      Returns:
      a list of all medical records

    • readById

      @GetMapping("medicalrecord/{firstName}.{lastName}") public Medicalrecord readById(@PathVariable String firstName, @PathVariable String lastName)
      Retrieves a medical record by the first and last name.
      Parameters:
      firstName - the first name of the person
      lastName - the last name of the person
      Returns:
      the medical record of the person with the specified first and last name

    • create

      @PostMapping("/medicalrecord") public String create(@RequestBody Medicalrecord medicalRecord)
      Creates a new medical record.
      Parameters:
      medicalRecord - the medical record to create
      Returns:
      a message indicating the medical record was created

    • delete

      @DeleteMapping("/medicalrecord/{firstName}.{lastName}") public String delete(@PathVariable String firstName, @PathVariable String lastName)
      Deletes a medical record by the first and last name.
      Parameters:
      firstName - the first name of the person
      lastName - the last name of the person
      Returns:
      a message indicating the medical record was deleted

    • update

      @PutMapping("/medicalrecord/{firstName}.{lastName}") public String update(@RequestBody Medicalrecord updatedRecord, @PathVariable String firstName, @PathVariable String lastName)
      Updates an existing medical record.
      Parameters:
      updatedRecord - the updated medical record data
      firstName - the first name of the person
      lastName - the last name of the person
      Returns:
      a message indicating the medical record was updated
